title: 数据库迁移计划
situation: Planning a database migration. You need to discuss downtime and rollback strategy.

turns.speaker: partner
turns.text: 这次迁移要改schema，可能涉及主从切换。
turns.pinyin: Zhè cì qiānyí yào gǎi schema, kěnéng shèjí zhǔ cóng qiēhuàn.
turns.translation: This migration changes the schema, might involve master-replica failover.

turns.speaker: user
turns.text: 预计要停服多久？我们需要提前通知用户。
turns.pinyin: Yùjì yào tíng fú duōjiǔ? Wǒmen xūyào tíqián tōngzhī yònghù.
turns.translation: How long is the expected downtime? We need to notify users in advance.
suggestions: 预计要停服多久？我们需要提前通知用户。

turns.speaker: partner
turns.text: 正常情况下十五到二十分钟，我们有rollback方案。
turns.pinyin: Zhèngcháng qíngkuàng xià shíwǔ dào èrshí fēnzhōng, wǒmen yǒu rollback fāng'àn.
turns.translation: Normally 15–20 minutes. We have a rollback plan.

turns.speaker: user
turns.text: 那定在凌晨三点吧，流量最低。我这边准备公告和告警。
turns.pinyin: Nà dìng zài língchén sān diǎn ba, liúliàng zuì dī. Wǒ zhè biān zhǔnbèi gōnggào hé gàojǐng.
turns.translation: Let's schedule for 3am then, lowest traffic. I'll prepare the announcement and alerts.
suggestions: 那定在凌晨三点吧，流量最低。我这边准备公告和告警。
